name: Mad Cop 2 - Police Car Race and Drift
name_original: Mad Cop 2 - Police Car Race and Drift
description:
If you enjoyed or even heard about Mad Cop that offered a great chance to master drifting skills, now is the time to take the challenges of Mad Cop 2, a game that is way ahead of its predecessor, as it presents several more challenges, which is a great improvement to give it a more real life like feel.

Now is your chance to take on challenges of not just drifting a car on an empty road:
- Performing a crazy drift at a speed of 200+ km/hr;
- Drifting dangerously close enough to people without hitting them;
- Responsibility of finding illegal drifters and arresting them.

And while doing all of these together, there is a master challenge of scoring enough points by performing all these tasks and completing required drift stunts at specific areas of checkpoint to score sufficient points overall.

As you can see, the new version actually offers a lot more challenges than you faced before. It is no longer about trying stunts on empty tracks but about getting a complete real life feel of driving and drifting.

Key features:

- Realistic 3D Physics for cars movements
- Different Tasks/Assignments
- Perfect performance on all devices
- Retina Support
- No in-app purchases - just drift, earn points and unlock new levels!

So drive like a Mad Cop, drift your way through to glory!
